read_ahead.description: Number of frames ahead to precache during playback.

static_cache_delay_milliseconds.description: Number of milliseconds to wait after playhead has stopped moving to re-start full timeline cacheing.

max_compare_sources.description: Maximum number of media sources that can be compared via xstudio compare modes. Playback performance will suffer if you try and compare many sources.

playlist_default_compare.description: Set the default compare mode and auto align behaviour for new Playlists.

subset_default_compare.description: Set the default compare mode and auto align behaviour for new Subsets.

contact_sheet_default_compare.description: Set the default compare mode and auto align behaviour for new Contact Sheets.

timeline_default_compare.description: Set the default compare mode and auto align behaviour for new Timelines.
